text: Bomarea chimborazensis is a species of flowering plant in the family Alstroemeriaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. It is a plant of páramo habitat. It is threatened by fires set by people.Mogollón, H. and N. Pitman. 2003. Bomarea chimborazensis. In: IUCN 2012. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2012.2. Downloaded on 01 July 2013. ==References== chimborazensis Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Endangered plants Category:Páramo flora Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Bomarea chimborazensis
